summary: HR Specialist with extensive experience in information systems management, HR automation, and personnel data reporting within DoD civilian HR programs. Proficient in DCPDS, USA Staffing, SAP/Business Objects, SharePoint, and CPAC operations; strong trainer, analyst, and advisor for HR systems and policy compliance.

experience.title: HR Specialist (Information Systems)
experience.company: Fort Bragg Installation Civilian Personnel Information Systems Manager
experience.description: Responsible for establishing and implementing automated personnel policy; advisory on automation issues; system access control; training administration; troubleshooting; HR automation system software functionality and interfaces; hardware maintenance; SharePoint infrastructure; webmaster for CPAC websites; development of training plans; user support; and account management for Fort Bragg CPAC personnel systems.

experience.title: HR Specialist
experience.company: Pine Bluff Arsenal, Department of the Army, Civilian HR Agency
experience.description: Senior HR Specialist leading a four-person team in recruitment and placement; managed user accounts; served as HR Automation Program Administrator; installation Information Management Officer for HR automation; conducted workforce needs assessments; developed training materials; conducted on-site training for over 1,200 employees; built USA Staffing processes; advised on staffing strategies; PPP and Reemployment Priority List program operations.

experience.title: HR Specialist
experience.company: Pine Bluff Arsenal, Department of the Army, Civilian HR Agency
experience.description: HR Automation Program Administrator; installation Information Management Officer for HR automation; managed organization-wide HR automation accounts; provided system guidance; supported CAC enabling, PPP pre-requisitioning, USA Staffing conversion; developed and delivered HR process training; authored guidance for resolution of user issues; performed job analyses and supported recruitment and placement; PPP and Reemployment Priority List program administrator.
